name: S L A S H C R U N K
name_original: S L A S H C R U N K
description:
Fight strange enemies in an adrenaline pumping rogue-lite hack n' slash!

Keyboard Controls:

Movement: WASD

Attack: Left-Click

Dash: Right-Click or Spacebar

Gamepad Controls:

Movement: Joystick

Attack: B

Dash: A

Credits:

Ryan - Audio / Soundtrack

Kara - Art

Clay - Art

Cid - Art

Shawn - Programming

Justin - QA
